Package lpool.logic.match

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BallsMoving  
    CueBallInHand
    State representing the act of repositioning the cue ball when the other player commits a foul.
    End  
    FreezeTime  
    Match  
    Play  
    PlayValidator
    Class responsible for analyzing the legality of a Play and determining whether or not the current player should play again.
    Racker
    Generates a valid position for the balls to start, according to the rules of the game.
  • Enum Summary
